description: It's a lazy spring afternoon and Connor Maguire is sitting by the pool taking in some sun. Lucas Knight is rustling around in his bed, with a good idea of how he'd like to spend the rest of the day. So he sends a text to Connor and Connor responds immediately. Minutes later, Connor arrives and finds Lucas waiting in bed, his dick already half hard in anticipation. Connor pushes him back onto the bed and Lucas unzips his pants, groping for Connor's dick as he takes off his clothes. Lucas tongues the head as Connor closes his eyes and swells up to maximum proportion, before bending Lucas over easing himself in. Lucas loves the sensation of getting fucked by Connor, and it shows on his face, as Connor pulls him closer and runs his lips down Lucas' back, before they both shoot loads all over each other in the orange light of the setting sun.Enjoy!
title: Come Together
